CustomField.description: Flag field hidden from layout to determine if Account Conv KPI is met/missed. 0=Missed 1=Met
CustomField.formula:
IF (ISNULL( Custodial_Account_Number_Received__c ),
(IF (CONTAINS( TEXT(Custodian__c) , "Schwab"), IF( Time_To_Account_Conv_KPI__c > 35, 0, null), IF( Time_To_Account_Conv_KPI__c > 20, 0,null))),
(IF (CONTAINS( TEXT(Custodian__c) , "Schwab"), IF( Time_To_Account_Conv_KPI__c < 36, 1, 0), IF( Time_To_Account_Conv_KPI__c < 21, 1, 0))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Flag field hidden from layout to determine if Account Conv KPI is met/missed. 0=Missed 1=Met
CustomField.label: Time To Account Conv KPI Met
